name: Trust proceedings; initiation by notice; necessary parties
text:
§560:7-206  Trust proceedings; initiation by notice; necessary parties.  Proceedings under section 560:7-201 are initiated by filing a petition in the court and giving notice pursuant to section 560:1-401 to interested persons.  The court may order notification of additional persons.  A decree is valid as to all who are given notice of the proceeding though fewer than all interested persons are notified. [L 1976, c 200, pt of §1]
 
Rules of Court
 
  Trust proceedings, see HPR rule 126.
 
Case Notes
 
  Term "decree" includes the term "order"; section not mutually exclusive with §560:1-403; applicable to §560:1-106.  7 H. App. 640, 791 P.2d 398.
